allOf.description: Common parts of all types of activation

status.description:
Activation status.
`active` enables profiles activation, `inactive` disables profile activation.
If activation has no audience associated with it, Activation API will always return `inactive`.

trigger.description:
Signal that triggers an activation.
`onjoin` makes joining an audience trigger activation.
`onleave` makes leaving an audience trigger activation.

audience.description: Audience to be activated. Might be missing if the related `audience` gets removed.

id.description: ID of an audience that is activated

name.description: Name of an audience that is activated

required_consents.description: Consent types a profile must contain to be activated

items.description: Actions a visitor may give consent for

multiple.description: Whether one profile can be activated multiple times

multiple_user_ids.description: Whether a profile containing more than one user ID can be activated

is_author.description: Whether the current user is the author of this activation

webhook_url.description: Webhook URL pointing at some external system

webhook_body_attributes.description: Profile's attributes used in a simple webhook request. Used for constructing body template on front-end.

items.description: An attribute that is used by an activation

key.description: Key (parameter) name used to pass an attribute to a webhook

value.description: Name (column_id) of profile attribute used as a source for this attribute's value

analytics_column_id.description: Name of the column in Analytics module. Used to calculate audience count.

analytics_transformation_id.description: Transformation name used in Analytics module to calculate audience count. Currently one option available.

value_selectors.description: List of value selectors possible for given column.

extractions.description: List of extractions possible for given column.

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

custom_value.description: Custom value that can be provided manually for given attribute

webhook_body_template.description: Template of a webhook request body with attribute placeholders. Backend fills this template with profile attributes and sends it to webhook_url.

allOf.description: Common parts of all types of activation

status.description:
Activation status.
`active` enables profiles activation, `inactive` disables profile activation.
If activation has no audience associated with it, Activation API will always return `inactive`.

trigger.description:
Signal that triggers an activation.
`onjoin` makes joining an audience trigger activation.
`onleave` makes leaving an audience trigger activation.

audience.description: Audience to be activated. Might be missing if the related `audience` gets removed.

id.description: ID of an audience that is activated

name.description: Name of an audience that is activated

required_consents.description: Consent types a profile must contain to be activated

items.description: Actions a visitor may give consent for

multiple.description: Whether one profile can be activated multiple times

multiple_user_ids.description: Whether a profile containing more than one user ID can be activated

is_author.description: Whether the current user is the author of this activation

gads_manager_id.description: Google Ads customer's manager ID (login customer ID)

gads_manager_name.description: Google Ads customer's manager name (login customer name)

gads_user_list_action.description:
What to do with the profile.
`add` adds profile to the user list, `remove` removes profile from the user list.

gads_identifier_sources.description:
Object describing source of identifiers sent to Google Ads.
At last one of email, phone, complete address (first name, last name, country code, zip code) must be provided.

email_address_attribute.description: Attribute from which email will be taken and its extraction

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

phone_number_attribute.description: Attribute from which phone number will be taken

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

first_name_attribute.description: Attribute from which first name will be taken

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

last_name_attribute.description: Attribute from which last name will be taken

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

country_code_attribute.description: Attribute from which country code will be taken

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

zip_code_attribute.description: Attribute from which zip code will be taken

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

gclid_attribute.description: Attribute from which gclid will be taken and its extraction

column_id.description: Attribute from which given identifier will be taken

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

gads_timestamp_source.description: Source of conversion timestamp. Must be a datetime attribute.

extraction.description: How to extract value from source attribute. Should be skipped when profile attribute stores only one value.

400.description: Bad request response (e.g. missing GET parameter, parameter value out of bounds)

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid

404.description: Resource not found (bad ID or resource deleted)

422.description: Data in body does not meet requirements (e.g. missing field)

500.description: Internal application error response (some service encountered unexpected error)

400.description: Bad request response (e.g. missing GET parameter, parameter value out of bounds)

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid

404.description: Resource not found (bad ID or resource deleted)

422.description: Data in body does not meet requirements (e.g. missing field)

500.description: Internal application error response (some service encountered unexpected error)

OrganizationHeaderAuth.name: X-Organization
OrganizationHeaderAuth.description: Organization name as the header value
